entry.title: For Ukraine, Dnipro Apartment Strike Becomes a Symbol of Russian Cruelty
entry.content: The deaths of civilians including children are drawing expressions of anger and resolve in Ukraine and the West as the war approaches the one-year mark.

entry.title: Poland Suggests Sending German-Made Tanks to Ukraine Without Berlin's OK
entry.content: The statement is the latest sign of exasperation shared by the U.S. and its European allies that Germanyâ€™s hesitation over sending tanks will deprive Ukraine of critical resources in its war with Russia.
